title: All i want is a gift ;(
body: I Have been playing LoL for so long and every since the gifting a friend has come out, i haven't received a gift from any of my LoL friends or piers. Why must life be so cruel {{champion:32}} All i want is a friend to gift me a skin, so i can at-least feel some love in this community

replies.body:
piers? i think its peers.


Also it's probably because you're not attractive. Im a girl and I've gotten countless skins lmao.

i wouldnt say boosted :) good friends who are relatively better than myself duo queue with me :)
I think its because we r grills. I've been gifted 14 times.
ahem miss do not dis respect players your not above the men who play LoL

I got a free shaco skin cuz I rekt riven in a game
Just play some ranked :0. People like doing the mystery gift to a team member/ enemy team member at the end of the game fairly often ~1/10-20 games.
